title: Charming Historic Studio Retreat in Wola
description: Step into a uniquely charming studio apartment that beautifully combines Warsaw's past and present. Measuring a comfortable 36 square meters, this residence welcomes you with original hardwood flooring, a cozy built-in fireplace, and modern underfloor heating for comfort all year round. Enjoy hosting or unwinding beside the warmth of your own fireplace, a rare feature among studio homes. Thanks to an automatic gate, coming home and accessing your private parking space is made effortless.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the high-energy heart of Wola—a district rich in history yet buzzing with modern innovations—this home appeals to urban adventurers. The area is known for its strong tech-oriented atmosphere, abundant green pockets, and convenient access to central Warsaw’s best amenities including cafes, co-working spaces, and cultural spots.
lifestyle_benefits: Perfect for expats seeking a blend of history and modernity
In walking distance to coworking hubs and green spaces
target_buyer: Ideal for expats, remote workers, and unmarried professionals looking for an inspiring, historic, and conveniently located home in central Warsaw.
market_positioning: This property stands out in the studio apartment segment of Wola thanks to its rare character features, top-tier amenities, and superb location in a sought-after, tech-focused district close to everything Warsaw has to offer.
